entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:07 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:07 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:07 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
